00010 ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder() { fDataRecord = NULL; fWaveformLength = -1; }
00011 
00012 bool ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::SetDataRecord(UInt_t* dataRecord) 
00013 {
00014   fDataRecord = dataRecord;
00015   fWaveformLength = (  LengthOf(fDataRecord) / (kWaveformLength/2)  )  * 1024;
00016 
00017   ORLog(kDebug) << "SetDataRecord(): Setting the data record..." << std::endl;
00018   // remarks for Till: LengthOf(...) is from ORVDataDecoder and is the length extracted from data record -tb-
00019   if(!IsValid() || LengthOf(fDataRecord) != kBufHeadLen + GetWaveformLen()/2) {
00020     ORLog(kDebug) << "SetDataRecord(): data record is not valid" << std::endl;
00021     ORLog(kDebug) << "LengthOf(data record) : " << LengthOf(fDataRecord)
00022       << " kBufHeadLen + GetWaveformLen()/2: " << kBufHeadLen + GetWaveformLen()/2 << std::endl;
00023     fDataRecord = NULL;
00024     fWaveformLength = -1;
00025     return false;
00026   }
00027   ORLog(kDebug) << "SetDataRecord(): Exiting" << std::endl;
00028   return true;
00029 }
00030 
00031 bool ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::IsValid() 
00032 { 
00033   ORLog(kDebug) << "IsValid(): starting... " << std::endl;
00034   if(IsShort(fDataRecord)) { 
00035     ORLog(kError) << "Data file is short" << std::endl; 
00036     return false;
00037   } 
00038   return true;
00039 }
00040 
00041 void ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::DumpBufferHeader()
00042 {
00043   if(fDataRecord)
00044   {
00045     ORLog(kDebug) << "Dumping Data Buffer Header (Raw Data): " << std::endl;
00046     ORLog(kDebug) << "**************************************************" << std::endl;
00047     for(size_t i=2;i<kBufHeadLen; i++)
00048     {
00049       ORLog(kDebug) << fDataRecord[i] << std::endl;
00050     }
00051     ORLog(kDebug) << "**************************************************" << std::endl;
00052   }
00053 }
00054 
00055 size_t ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::CopyWaveformData( UShort_t* waveform, 
00056                                                      size_t len )
00057 //copies the waveform data to the array pointed to by
00058 //waveform, which is of length len
00059 {
00060   size_t wflen = GetWaveformLen();
00061   if (wflen == 0) return 0;
00062   if ((len < wflen) || (len == 0)) {
00063     ORLog(kWarning) << "CopyWaveformData(): destination array length is " << len 
00064                     << "; waveform data length is " << GetWaveformLen() << std::endl;
00065   }
00066   else len = GetWaveformLen(); 
00067   UInt_t* waveformData = GetWaveformDataPointer();
00068   for(size_t i=0;i<len;i+=2) 
00069   {
00070     //bin swapping handling changed 2008-11-18 (svn rev >=1354)  ml, -tb-
00071     waveform[i] = (waveformData[i/2] & 0xFFFF);  
00072     waveform[i+1] = ((waveformData[i/2] & 0xFFFF0000) >> 16) ;  
00073   }
00074   return len;
00075 }
00076 
00077 size_t ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::CopyWaveformDataDouble(double* waveform, size_t len)
00078 //copies the waveform data to the array pointed to by
00079 //waveform, which is of length len
00080 {
00081   size_t wflen = GetWaveformLen();
00082   if (wflen == 0) return 0;
00083   if ((len < wflen) || (len == 0)) {
00084     ORLog(kWarning) << "CopyWaveformData(): destination array length is " << len 
00085                     << "; waveform data length is " << GetWaveformLen() << std::endl;
00086   }
00087   else len = GetWaveformLen(); 
00088   UInt_t* waveformData = GetWaveformDataPointer();
00089   for(size_t i=0;i<len;i+=2) 
00090   {
00091     //bin swapping handling changed 2008-11-18 (svn rev >=1354)  ml, -tb-
00092     waveform[i] = (double) (waveformData[i/2] & 0xFFFF);  
00093     waveform[i+1] = (double) ((waveformData[i/2] & 0xFFFF0000) >> 16) ;  
00094   }
00095   return len;
00096 }

00100 void ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::Dump(UInt_t* dataRecord) //debugging 
00101 {
00102   ORLog(kDebug) << std::endl << std::endl << "ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::Dump():" << std::endl ;
00103   if(!SetDataRecord(dataRecord)) return; 
00104   ORLog(kDebug) 
00105     << "  Header functions: " << std::endl
00106     << "    Crate = " << CrateOf() << "; card = " << CardOf() << std::endl
00107     << "    The buffer is " << kBufHeadLen << " (32-bit) words long" << std::endl
00108     << "    The Sec is " << GetSec() << std::endl
00109     << "    The SubSec is " << GetSubSec() << std::endl
00110     << "    The channel is " << GetChannel() << std::endl
00111     << "    The channel map is " << GetChannelMap() << std::endl
00112     << "    Energy: " << GetEnergy() << std::endl  
00113     << "    The ResetSec is " << GetResetSec() << std::endl        // -tb- 2008-02-12
00114     << "    The ResetSubSec is " << GetResetSubSec() << std::endl  // -tb- 2008-02-12
00115     << "    The waveform data has " << GetWaveformLen() 
00116       << " (32-bit) words" << std::endl;
00117 }
